Author: DutchCryptoStudent
Title: üöÄ [ANN][ICO] ByteBet:P2P betting platform - 10M total supply - 30% Discount
Body: Pre-Sale ByteBet  Bytebet's presale already started and I received the following information in the mail:  üî• 30% Discount  üíµ 1 BBET= 0.007 ETH = $2.95 (ETH=$422)  ‚òÄÔ∏è Very limited supply  ‚è∞ Limited time   Whitepaper: "Our minimum target is to collect 150 ETH worth of contributions (30,000 BBET tokens) but not more than 600 ETH (60,000 BBET tokens). During this stage, we will offer a 30% discount for our early supporters"   Hopefully, I understood the whitepaper correctly the first 30.000 tokens will be sold with 30% discount which means the first 210 ETH ($88.500) investments will have a discount. Then It seems that the other 30.000 tokens will be sold for 0.01 ETH each (300 ETH), which means $4.22 each which makes a total maximal goal of ($126.6k+$88.5k=$215.100). Total tokens sold are only 60.000, so the very limited supply makes the price higher of a token.  Suggestions for ByteBet:  * Spend more on marketing and explanation of the concept * Start making a more detailed roadmap * More information on total supply and price in pre-sale/ICO * Exchange list is maybe a bit late 2018Q2 * Find advisors and increase the size of the team * People need to be able to feel safe when they place a bet (transparency and information is important to add on the website)  Looking forward to the Alpha version in 2018Q1!

Author: tamastorok
Title: üöÄ [ANN][ICO] ByteBet:P2P betting platform - 10M total supply - 30% Discount
Body: ByteBet Peer-to-peer, community-driven betting platform on Ethereum  About ByteBet ByteBet is a peer-to-peer, community-driven betting platform based on Ethereum that allows players from anywhere in the world to create customized bets and play against each other.  Problem In the original gambling model, players bet against the house where a high house edge is applied on every single bet the players make. No matter if the player wins or loses, the house edge is always applied, making it much harder not to lose money in the long run. The middleman's only intention is to make sure players play as many times as possible and lose their funds in the long-term, providing a steady income for the gambling site owners..  Benefits Low betting fees: by using blockchain technology fees can be decreased, leaving more money for the players. Reward system: 50% of the fees are shared between active community members and BBET token holders. Peer-to-peer: players bet against each other, not against the house. Customizable bets: players can create their own fully-customized bets and publish them on the platform.  How it works This flowchart explains how ByteBet works: https://imgur.com/p3B5f6w Learn more in the whitepaper: https://byte.bet/  Fee model Betting fees are kept low and maximum 1.5% fee levied on the winner‚Äôs prize. 50% of this fee is shared with the community members.  Fee model and reward system: https://imgur.com/zHbAnQJ  Roadmap Late October 2017: Whitepaper - Read it here: https://byte.bet/ 21st-29th of November 2017: Pre-Token Donation - Join here: https://byte.bet/ January/February 2018: Token donation (main round) Q1 2018: Talent acquisition/Team scale up Q2 2018: Exchange listing Q1 2018: ByteBet alpha release Q2 2018: ByteBet beta release Q3 2018: Growth and marketing campaign  An updated roadmap will be published after the main round.   About ByteBet token (it‚Äôs not just for gamblers!) A ByteBet token (BBET) is used as a core element on ByteBet‚Äôs decentralized platform. A BBET token is a standard ERC-20 token created on the Ethereum network. This means all the infrastructure is already provided to store and transfer BBET tokens. Creating and joining games is only possible by using BBET tokens. Winners receive their prize in BBET tokens and also rewards are paid in BBET tokens.  Members who take part in verifying events receive a portion from the fees. Holding ByteBet tokens also entitles players to receive a share from the fees depending on their stake.  About the core team The core team members have been working together for more than three years. The ByteBet team also consists of freelancers who are helping us with design and development-related activities.   Zoltan Molnar Mathematics and big data enthusiast possessing 5 years‚Äô experience with DevOps technologies. Zoltan was the CTO of an investor-backed startup for 3 years, and now works as a Consultant developer. Linkedin profile: https://www.linkedin.com/in/zmolnar/  Tamas Torok Tamas has been working in the tech sector for 4 years. He oversees the full marketing operation of startup companies, and is responsible for driving growth. He successfully self-published two books on Amazon and has guest written for leading online marketing blogs. Linkedin Profile: https://www.linkedin.com/in/toroktomi/  Attila Varga Attila has 6 years of experience in web development and has worked in different layers of the stack using various programming languages and technologies. Although he designed and implemented scalable, real-time and Big Data backends, he is passionate about the latest frontend technologies and able to implement pixel-perfect designs and UX. Twitter: https://twitter.com/artit91  Bounty/Referral program As part of our promotion plan during the token donation rounds, a referral campaign will be launched. This will allow users to invite others to take part in the ICO for a small reward.  For translation, content writing and social media bounties see the thread below OR visit: https://byte.bet/  Keep Updated About The Project Website: https://byte.bet/ Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/ByteBet/ Twitter: https://twitter.com/ByteBetPlatform Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/ByteBet-177015999513763/ Email: hello@byte.bet

Author: tamastorok
Title: üöÄ [ANN][ICO] ByteBet:P2P betting platform - 10M total supply - 30% Discount
Body: We let the community decide on the results, any members can vote on what really happened. We are using game theory techniques to filter out the "lies". By ‚Äòpunishing‚Äô the ones who voted on the false result and rewarding the others. This way we can minimalize the number of false results.   Currently, we‚Äôre working on the technical details. Stay tuned for our coming whitepaper.

Author: DutchCryptoStudent
Title: üöÄ [ANN][ICO] ByteBet:P2P betting platform - 10M total supply - 30% Discount
Body: Hi guys,  Looks like a good platform that I've never heard of before. Gambling in a way that users bet against each other is different from the current betting websites I know of and would it would be nice to experience this new way of gambling. I just have to see where it is going with respect to the result of each bet and whether it will be possible to place so many bets at one time, say for example a weekend where more people use gambling sites to bet on sport events, if it is still possible to check whether all bets are valid and if the community is acting in a fair way to provide 100% true outcomes.  The cool things about ByteBet is that they will pay all coinholders, I would see this as a dividend for people that hold the coin in their wallet. In the white paper it stated that 0.25% of the fees paid on creating a bet will be redistributed to people that own the coin in the portfolio. By holding the coin you will receive ByteBet coins if someone is using them on the ByteBet platform. Moreover the fees paid, the people that help verify the created bet will also be rewarded with 0.5% of the total bet placed which is an argument that the community will act in a fair way in order to receive some ByteBet coins!  Besides, all betting sites I know of are making huge profits today and their revenues are still increasing. You may have heard that there are already a few betting websites that make use of cryptocurrency right now, I would say that this one is quite different and is not focusing on the huge profits but more on its users itself, let's say its community. It is the same as the other altcoins in the market but adding this unique feature which might turn out to be a very interesting way of gambling between people. However there is no real evidence that this way of gambling works, I would still invest some money into this project to see whether it works and to see if this can become a game changing gambling platform.  I do see potential in the idea of this gambling site and am looking forward to see where things are going, only point that I think will be hard to implement is all the technology to get everything exactly right the way it is supposed to without any errors. These errors can occur because it is a new concept which has not yet been tested, so I am only a bit scared that people might gain an advantage by something where ByteBet is not thinking about right now. However, we can only know whether there is any error when the platform is running.  The team is also looking a bit small to me, they say that they are making use of freelancers to get things done. I would say that ByteBet should increase its team in order to make the concept more trustworthy. However, I think that a team of 2 + freelancers has a possibility to lead to succes, other investors might want to see a bigger team and maybe advisors before putting some money into a project like this!  Let me know if I am missing anything on this forum please and Good Luck to this project!

Author: tamastorok
Title: üöÄ [ANN][ICO] ByteBet:P2P betting platform - 10M total supply - 30% Discount
Body: Thank you for the supportive comment!  We're working day and night to make this project a reality.  We're determined to create a platform that gives betting back to people, where conditions are much fairer compared to the old gambling model. It means that our profit will be lower, but still have to make sure that ByteBet will be profitable.  Yeah, errors can (and will) occur when the platform is launched so this is why we will let only just a small amount of people in the platform to test the very first version. As the system becomes more stable, we will open it up for more people.  We're a small team, so as you said it's crucial to get more team members on board. Our intention is to kickstart the project with a small team and then focus our efforts to find talented people who can help us build ByteBet.

Title: üöÄ [ANN][ICO] ByteBet:P2P betting platform - 10M total supply - 30% Discount
Body: ByteBet's bounty program  FOR CONTENT CREATION:  Receive BBET tokens when you publish high-quality material about ByteBet on your blog, website, Youtube channel, or email list.  Rules  Your content must be original and high quality - no spam or unethical marketing Posts must be written in any of the following languages: English, Chinese, Russian or Spanish Your content must link to https://byte.bet/ Your content must be unique Your site or channel is popular or known in its niche. At least 1000 followers for social media and video channels. Your post must be longer than 300 words (if text) and longer than 30 seconds (if video)  Some preferred Channels https://medium.com https://steemit.com https://reddit.com https://youtube.com  Reward: From 10 BBET to 100 BBET depending on the quality of your content and popularity of your website or channel.  Complete this form after you publish your content to receive reward. https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSdmBwh3M3PXhb3fnkzS4j_8ihVYTitjbaZ-4UK9VVSmVx8m_A/viewform   TRANSLATION:  Earn 5 BBET tokens by translating our BitcoinTalk thread.  Requirements: The translation must be high quality; not done by using google translate. We‚Äôre looking for translations in the following languages: Russian, Chinese, German, Arabic, Hebrew, French, Korean, Portuguese, Japanese  Apply here: https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSd05N0xN_PSrgKRzL2IYBj57aG-Z2HY9TRZ-6A-dPx3ShEazw/viewform  Note: whoever gets to sign up first will be assigned to the task (you will receive a confirmation by email).   SOCIAL MEDIA SHARE  Follow us on Twitter and Facebook and post an update about ByteBet, including this link: https://byte.bet/. This reward can be unlocked only once during the token donation rounds.  Please, make sure that the post is not private and visible to the public.  Twitter 501-1000 Followers: 0.5 BBET token 1001+ Followers: 1 BBET token  Your Twitter account must-have at least 80% audit score, please check it here first: https://www.twitteraudit.com You have to follow ByteBet on Twitter: https://twitter.com/ByteBetPlatform Link to your post must be provided in the form.  Apply here: https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSf82Jywp1xchwi8yJmabPZXhHvm64xeYdXimK98RkmGNZtPcA/viewform?usp=sf_link   Facebook  Post about ByteBet with a link to our official website (https://byte.bet/) and earn 0.5 BBET token.  Make sure the post is visible to the public. You have to follow ByteBet on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/ByteBet-177015999513763/ Link to your post must be provided in the form.  Apply here: https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSf82Jywp1xchwi8yJmabPZXhHvm64xeYdXimK98RkmGNZtPcA/viewform?usp=sf_link   Please note  This bounty program will close when either the ByteBet token donation has ended or the maximum amount has been reached.  When will you receive your reward?  Bounties will be distributed after the end of each token donation round. If you have any questions, feel free to ask on our Rocket chat group. https://bytebet.rocket.chat/

Author: tamastorok
Title: üöÄ [ANN][ICO] ByteBet:P2P betting platform - 10M total supply - 30% Discount
Body: The old betting model has an unfair advantage against the players. They want to make sure that they lose their money in the long-term, that's the profit the gambling site earns. We're creating a fair environment where this middleman is eliminated (no house edge and unfair conditions). Since players bet against each other the money stays with the community, not with the gambling site owner. That's a huge difference.

Author: tamastorok
Title: üöÄ [ANN][ICO] ByteBet:P2P betting platform - 10M total supply - 30% Discount
Body: In order to avoid the tsunami of fake profiles voting for false results, players (voters) are required to have a minimum amount of BBET tokens stored on the platform.  We haven't decided yet if we should give different weight to the voters. If we decide to do so the only possible way to differentiate voters is based on their voting history (reliability) NOT the number of tokens they own.
